vista.graph
Class Legend

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.GraphicElement
      vista.graph.GEContainer
          vista.graph.Legend
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Animate, Bounded, BoundedComposite, Composite, Drawable, DrawableComposite, FontResizable, Layoutable, ScaledElement
public class Legend
extends GEContainer
implements ScaledElement

This is an aggregate of LegendItem(s). The layout is handled by the GELineLayout

Version:
$Id: Legend.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:03 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu
See Also:
LegendItem, GELineLayout
